alert.note: Alert for Carter (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:28PM MDT until June 26 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CARTER COUNTY... At 727 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Lake Gardner, or 14 miles west of Buffalo, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Torrential rainfall is also occurring. Be alert for localized flooding. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Carter County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
